prayers.name: Chaplet of Divine Mercy
prayers.details: Eternal Father, I offer You the Body, Blood, Soul, and Divinity of Your dearly beloved Son, Our Lord Jesus Christ.

prayers.name: Chaplet of St. Michael
prayers.details: St. Michael the Archangel, defend us in battle; be our protection against the wickedness and snares of the devil.

prayers.name: Chaplet of the Holy Wounds
prayers.details: I adore Thee, O Holy Wounds of my Savior. May the grace of your healing be with me.

prayers.name: Chaplet of the Sacred Heart
prayers.details: O Sacred Heart of Jesus, I place all my trust in Thee.

prayers.name: Chaplet of the Seven Sorrows
prayers.details: Through her sorrows, may we find strength and comfort in our own sufferings.

prayers.name: Our Father
prayers.details: Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name...

prayers.name: Hail Mary
prayers.details: Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with Thee...

prayers.name: Glory Be
prayers.details: Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit...

prayers.name: Act of Contrition
prayers.details: O my God, I am heartily sorry for having offended Thee...

prayers.name: Apostles' Creed
prayers.details: I believe in God, the Father almighty, Creator of heaven and earth...

prayers.name: Prayer to the Holy Spirit
prayers.details: Come, Holy Spirit, fill the hearts of your faithful and enkindle in them the fire of your love.

prayers.name: Holy Spirit Novena
prayers.details: I pray for the gifts of the Holy Spirit to guide me in my decisions.

prayers.name: Prayer for Guidance
prayers.details: Holy Spirit, guide my thoughts and actions today.

prayers.name: Prayer for Peace
prayers.details: Come, Holy Spirit, bring peace to my heart and mind.

prayers.name: Prayer for Wisdom
prayers.details: Holy Spirit, grant me the wisdom to see the truth.

prayers.name: Rosary for Healing
prayers.details: Pray the Rosary for the healing of our bodies and souls.

prayers.name: Rosary of the Seven Sorrows
prayers.details: Meditate on the sorrows of Mary, our Mother.

prayers.name: Rosary of Joyful Mysteries
prayers.details: Reflect on the joyful mysteries of Jesus and Mary.

prayers.name: Rosary of Luminous Mysteries
prayers.details: Meditate on the mysteries of Christ's public life.

prayers.name: Rosary of Sorrowful Mysteries
prayers.details: Reflect on the passion and death of Christ.

prayers.name: Easter Vigil Prayer
prayers.details: May this Easter bring joy and new beginnings.

prayers.name: Prayer of the Resurrection
prayers.details: Celebrate the victory of Christ over death.

prayers.name: Easter Morning Prayer
prayers.details: Thank you, Lord, for the gift of eternal life.

prayers.name: Easter Blessing Prayer
prayers.details: May God's blessings be with us this Easter.

prayers.name: Prayer for Joy
prayers.details: Rejoice! He is risen! Let us celebrate His love.
